```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
#install.packages("jsonlite")
library(jsonlite)
business <- stream_in(file("business.json"),pagesize = 10000)
write.csv(business, file="business.csv")

B_c1<-subset(business,business$state=="FL") # Select the samples in state FL
write.csv(B_c1, file="B_c1.csv")
data<-read.csv("B_c1.csv",header = F)


data<-data[-1]
select<-c(1:11,20,22,27,28,29,33) # Variable selection
data<-data[select]
vname<-data[1,]
data<-subset(data,data[5]=="FL")
business_FL<-na.omit(data)  
names(business_FL)<-vname
write.csv(business_FL, file="business_FL.csv", row.names= FALSE)

```
